metadata.Title: CVE-2015-1817 on Ubuntu 14.04 ESM (trusty) - medium
metadata.Description:
Stack-based buffer overflow in the inet_pton function innetwork/inet_pton.c in musl libc 0.9.15 through 1.0.4, and 1.1.0 through1.1.7 allows attackers to have unspecified impact via unknown vectors.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2015-1817` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

musl - 0.9.15-1ubuntu0.1~esm1
musl-tools - 0.9.15-1ubuntu0.1~esm1
Available with Ubuntu Pro (Infra-only): https://ubuntu.com/pro

criterions.comment: musl package in trusty/esm was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '0.9.15-1ubuntu0.1~esm1').
